title: Deprecated libraries in OpenBSD
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
There are several deprecated C libraries in OpenBSD 5.1

$./all.bash                                                                   
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, openbsd/amd64.
lib9
libbio
libmach
misc/pprof
cmd/addr2line
/usr/local/go/pkg/obj/openbsd_amd64/libmach.a(sym.o)(.text+0x1d67): In function
`syminit':
/usr/local/go/src/libmach/sym.c:303: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused, please
use strlcpy()
cmd/cov
cmd/nm
/usr/local/go/pkg/obj/openbsd_amd64/libmach.a(sym.o)(.text+0x1d67): In function
`syminit':
/usr/local/go/src/libmach/sym.c:303: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused, please
use strlcpy()
cmd/objdump
/usr/local/go/pkg/obj/openbsd_amd64/libmach.a(sym.o)(.text+0x1d67): In function
`syminit':
/usr/local/go/src/libmach/sym.c:303: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused, please
use strlcpy()
cmd/pack
/var/tmp/go-cbuild-8YUomK/ar.o(.text+0x608): In function `arstrdup':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/pack/ar.c:1654: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused, please
use strlcpy()
cmd/prof
cmd/cc
cmd/gc
cmd/6l
/var/tmp/go-cbuild-8YUomK/dwarf.o(.text+0xd99): In function `defptrto':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/6l/../ld/dwarf.c:1187: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused,
please use strlcpy()
/var/tmp/go-cbuild-8YUomK/lib.o(.text+0x1feb): In function `addlib':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/6l/../ld/lib.c:168: warning: strcat() is almost always misused,
please use strlcat()
cmd/6a
/var/tmp/go-cbuild-8YUomK/lex.o(.text+0xa0f): In function `macexpand':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/6a/../cc/macbody:399: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused,
please use strlcpy()
/var/tmp/go-cbuild-8YUomK/lex.o(.text+0x15bd): In function `macinc':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/6a/../cc/macbody:583: warning: strcat() is almost always misused,
please use strlcat()
cmd/6c
/usr/local/go/pkg/obj/openbsd_amd64/libcc.a(lex.o)(.text+0x141b): In function `slookup':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/cc/lex.c:358: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused, please
use strlcpy()
/var/tmp/go-cbuild-8YUomK/list.o(.text+0x3df): In function `Dconv':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/6c/list.c:205: warning: strcat() is almost always misused, please
use strlcat()
cmd/6g
/var/tmp/go-cbuild-8YUomK/gobj.o(.text+0x5b9): In function `dgostringptr':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/6g/gobj.c:452: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused, please
use strlcpy()
/var/tmp/go-cbuild-8YUomK/list.o(.text+0x4b1): In function `Dconv':
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/6g/list.c:161: warning: strcat() is almost always misused, please
use strlcat()
pkg/runtime
